name: Puzzle Adventure: Monster Hunt
description:
New 3D mystery adventure game, filled with unique puzzles and logic riddles. Find hidden magical artifacts, treasures and crystals, explore supernatural world full of monsters, beasts, paranormal beings and hidden enchanted objects. Unravel spooky mysteries, escape from scary monsters and solve murders and crimes.

Become a detective, investigate stories and murders that connect to unique characters, monsters or beasts. Werewolves, ghosts, supernatural stories, and secrets await you in this 3D mystery puzzle adventure game. Help other characters to solve logic 3D puzzles, find hidden objects and treasures and escape tombs. New challenging puzzles, mysteries of the supernatural world.

Upgrade your camp, collect energy to explore the supernatural mysteries, puzzles, riddles and magical artifacts that will help you progress in this new 3D mystery adventure. Travel through beautiful 3D locations, supernatural world, secret tombs and find enchanted objects hidden in scary locations, guarded by ghosts, monsters and other mysterious supernatural beings.

Puzzle Adventure features:
▶ Explore supernatural world full of 3D mystery puzzles & riddles
▶ Find clues, follow them, solve puzzles and collect the rewards and magical objects
▶ Become an official detective for supernatural mysteries
▶ Communicate with spooky magical creatures
▶ Solve mystery & scary crimes and murders
▶ Explore beautiful and magical locations filled with adventurous quests
▶ Help your uncle and other important characters to catch monsters and ghosts
▶ Upgrade your camp to progress through puzzles and adventure faster

Prepare for the best 3D mystery puzzle adventure you ever played. Supernatural quests and secrets, detective work, magical monsters and beings and unique characters set in spooky puzzle adventure story.

PLEASE NOTE! Puzzle Adventure is an online free game to download and play that requires a network connection to play. Some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Do you have any suggestions or problems in your adventure? Our caring community managers would love to hear from you, visit https://care.pxfd.co/puzzleadventure!
